definition: clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role

sentences.english: Rib meat sheep will be washed, cut into 4 cm square block.
sentences.chinese: 將羊肋條肉洗淨，切成4釐米見方的塊。

sentences.english: Wash me, cleanse me in the blood That flowed from Calvary.
sentences.chinese: 求你所流寶貝血，洗淨我衆罪孽。

sentences.english: Heir of salvation, purchase of God, born of his Spirit, washed in his blood.
sentences.chinese: 爲父神後嗣，已得救贖，從聖靈得生，寶血洗淨。

sentences.english: Rinse ice bucket thoroughly after use.
sentences.chinese: 使用後要徹底洗淨冰桶。

sentences.english: Apply BF1 Hair Growth Conditioner onto scalp. Gently massage for 5 minutes then rinse Off.
sentences.chinese: 把護髮精華搽在頭皮上，按摩5分鐘，把頭髮洗淨。

sentences.english: Japonica rice cooked Shanglong Zheng Wash , dry stand -by .
sentences.chinese: 粳米洗淨上籠蒸熟，晾乾待用。
排骨汆水後以冷水洗淨備用。

sentences.english: Clean your finger, before you point my spots .
sentences.chinese: 先洗淨你的手指再指出我的污跡。

sentences.english: Wash pork spare-rib. Blanch the spare-rib in boiling water, remove.
sentences.chinese: 小排骨洗淨，放入滾水中燙過，取出備用。

sentences.english: Rinse the prawns thoroughly, devein, wipe to dry, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 花蝦洗淨，挑腸，抹乾備用。

sentences.english: Wash eggplant, remove stalks, oblique dual joint thick.
sentences.chinese: 將茄子洗淨，去蒂，斜切成雙聯厚片。

sentences.english: Wash and cut large straw mushrooms into halves. Make a cross cut on the  stalks of small ones.
sentences.chinese: 草菇洗淨，大粒折切開邊，小粒的在菇腳鎅一十字。

sentences.english: Rinse fresh lotus leaf, tear into small pieces.
Before applying Mepiform make sure the scar area and surrounding skin are clean and dry.
sentences.chinese: 使用前瘢痕和周圍的皮膚要洗淨擦乾。

sentences.english: Rinse the baby carrot and asparagus, and chop into small dices. Set aside.
sentences.chinese: 小甘筍及蘆筍洗淨後切小粒，備用。

sentences.english: Wash potato. Peel and slice. Steam potato for 20 minutes with high heat.
sentences.chinese: 薯仔洗淨去皮切成厚片，用大火蒸約20分鐘。

definition: black-boned chicken/silky fowl/silkie/Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson
